# matchSCore2Data 

Available at http://bioconductor.org/packages/matchSCore2Data/.

This is an R/[ExperimentHub](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/ExperimentHub.html) package for accessing data from the matchSCore2 project as [`SingleCellExperiment`](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/SingleCellExperiment.html) objects.
